    • createNotificationEvent

      cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.NotificationEvent createNotificationEvent(cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.NotificationEvent notificationEvent) throws OpenCDXNotAcceptable
      Create a Notification Event
      Parameters:
      notificationEvent - NotificationEvent to create.
      Returns:
      the created NotificationEvent.
      Throws:
      OpenCDXNotAcceptable - Failed to convert to JSON

    • getNotificationEvent

      cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.NotificationEvent getNotificationEvent(cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.TemplateRequest templateRequest) throws OpenCDXNotFound, OpenCDXNotAcceptable
      Get a Notification Event
      Parameters:
      templateRequest - Request ID of the NotificationEvent to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the requested NotificationEvent.
      Throws:
      OpenCDXNotFound - Template with requested ID not found.
      OpenCDXNotAcceptable

    • updateNotificationEvent

      cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.NotificationEvent updateNotificationEvent(cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.NotificationEvent notificationEvent) throws OpenCDXFailedPrecondition, OpenCDXNotAcceptable
      Update Notification Event
      Parameters:
      notificationEvent - NotificationEvent to update.
      Returns:
      the updated NotificationEvent.
      Throws:
      OpenCDXFailedPrecondition - Missing event id.
      OpenCDXNotAcceptable - Failed to convert to JSON

    • deleteNotificationEvent

      cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.SuccessResponse deleteNotificationEvent(cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.TemplateRequest templateRequest) throws OpenCDXNotAcceptable
      Delete Notification Event
      Parameters:
      templateRequest - Request ID of NotificationEvent to delete.
      Returns:
      SuccessResponse indicating if the action was successful.
      Throws:
      OpenCDXNotAcceptable - Failed to convert to JSON

    • sendNotification

      cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.SuccessResponse sendNotification(cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.Notification notification) throws OpenCDXFailedPrecondition, OpenCDXNotFound, OpenCDXNotAcceptable
      Send Notification
      Parameters:
      notification - Notification information to trigger.
      Returns:
      SuccessResponse indicating if the action was successful.
      Throws:
      OpenCDXNotFound - Template not found
      OpenCDXFailedPrecondition - Missing variable from data for substitution.
      OpenCDXNotAcceptable - Failed to convert to JSON

    • listNotificationEvents

      cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.NotificationEventListResponse listNotificationEvents(cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.NotificationEventListRequest request)
      List of all NotificationEvent
      Parameters:
      request - Request indicating pagination, sorting, and page size.
      Returns:
      requested NotificationEvent with page, sorting, and page size
